relevant_findings.reflexes: 3+ at biceps, triceps, brachioradialis, and knees; 4+ at Achilles' tendons with clonus; plantar reflexes mute.
relevant_findings.muscle_tone: Extreme rigidity of flexor and extensor muscles bilaterally; unable to flex right leg at knee or fully extend left leg.
relevant_findings.mobility: Unable to arise from supine or sitting position or walk without assistance.
relevant_findings.anxiety: Patient was anxious and in pain.
relevant_findings.bruise: A large bruise on right arm from a fall.
